The number of actions spent Casting this Spell determines its effect. The spell has a range of touch.
([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8 Hit Points to the target. --- **Heightened (+1)** The amount of healing increases by 1d8, and the additional healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
